str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, intend, desire, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to 'will, ' i.e. be willing.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Progress, advancement. From prokopto; progress, i.e. Advancement.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as euaggelizo; a good message, i.e. The gospel.
